solution_line_template: They sold {num_tickets} raffle tickets at ${ticket_price} a piece so {num_tickets}*{ticket_price} = $<<{num_tickets}*{ticket_price}={ticket_sales_revenue}>>{ticket_sales_revenue}

With another donation of ${donation_amount_20}, in total, they raised {ticket_sales_revenue}+{donations_15_total}+{donation_amount_20} = $<<{ticket_sales_revenue}+{donations_15_total}+{donation_amount_20}={total_money_raised}>>{total_money_raised}
